summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 2, 2020, discussing the arrest and processing of Ghislaine Maxwell. It details her initial appearance via video conference, her detention at Merrimack County jail in New Hampshire, and the plan to transfer her to the Southern District of New York (SDNY). The emails also discuss consular notification due to her dual US-UK citizenship.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the emails; she has been arrested and will be taken to Merrimack County jail for processing and an initial appearance, pending transfer to SDNY.

persons.name: SSA FBI New York
persons.context: The sender of the top email providing details about Maxwell's arrest, processing, and upcoming legal proceedings.

connections.description: The FBI agent is communicating operational details regarding Maxwell's arrest and custody.

events.title: Arrest and Initial Appearance of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is arrested and taken to Merrimack County jail for processing. She is scheduled for an initial appearance via video conference the same afternoon.

events.title: Planned Transfer to SDNY
events.description: Following her initial appearance, plans are made to transfer Maxwell from New Hampshire to the Southern District of New York via a removal order.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on July 2, 2020, and processed at Merrimack County jail in New Hampshire.
Her initial court appearance was scheduled for the afternoon of her arrest via video conference.
Plans were immediately made to transfer her from New Hampshire to the Southern District of New York (SDNY) under a removal order.
The FBI noted she is a dual US-UK citizen, prompting consular notification procedures.
The email chain indicates close internal coordination and media interest ('closely following this case') regarding her arrest.
